name: MixBall
description:
My first Game Jam entry!

For the Mix And Game Jam 2020, this game mixes the two genres Marble-Rolling (Marble Madness, Super Monkey Ball) and Sports (Tennis/Pinball/Baseball/Golf/Croquet). 

You play as a little figure with a small rod that you need to use to whack a ball through an obstacle course and get it to the goal. Be sure not to lose track of the ball!
